record.dc:title: 42JO14, 15JO14, Johnson County, Kentucky. Mayo. Feature #28.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: A rock [sandstone] filled fireplace showing a great deal of burning. Feature is in Sect. 40R14. Contained a few sherds but none of them were counted as F.S.Length 1.70 ft. N-SWidth 1.60 ft. E-W.This fireplace extended into the hardpan clay for 0.50 ft.
record.wpa:comments: More information, including diagram, available at institution.
